channel.title: 317 exp help
channel.description: hey everybody reading this please leave a comment when you are done and know what i am talking about. i am having a problem with my 317 server, here's my problem: i added Fletching, but i don't know how to set it so that when you try to fletch oak shorbows (u), maple shorbow (u), willow shortbow (u), yew shortbow (u), magic shortbow (u) at level 1 fletching it will not allow you because you dont have a high enough fletching level?

item.title: 317 exp help
item.dc:creator: @moparclient moparclient
item.description:
@moparclient wrote:

[quote=“sjoukjeowns, post:4, topic:326646”]if(playerLevel[10] >= 30){ sendMessage blalbla you cant do this cuz you don't have fletch }else{ dowhateva u wan't }

=30 means 30 or higher is requirment[/quote]

see what shit you post? < and > is basic math -.-

Read full topic

item.title: 317 exp help

item.description:
@teh_war_of_noobs wrote:

hey everybody reading this please leave a comment when you are done and know what i am talking about.
i am having a problem with my 317 server, here’s my problem:
i added Fletching, but i don’t know how to set it so that when you try to fletch oak shorbows (u), maple shorbow (u), willow shortbow (u), yew shortbow (u), magic shortbow (u) at level 1 fletching it will not allow you because you dont have a high enough fletching level?
